***This project is*** ![Under Construction](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?logo=data:image/png;base64,&label=Under&message=Construction&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=1D1D1D&color=ffff99), but coming very soon.

# Speckler-Powersehell

Powershell version of my speckler program.
I will be releasing a more performant C++ version soon which can be used in all shells.

---

## About

Fun little script to randomly paint colored squares on the screen in a Powershell terminal.
